testcase.name: when no track played yet, getPlayingTrack must return PlayingTrackNotExist exception
when play track then pause then stop then play again, pause time of play track must be 0
when stop and playing track exist,stop must be Success
when playNext until last track visit in playlist then addToQueue then playNext then playNext, must return EndOfPlayList Exception
when no track play yet, previous must return PreviousNotExist Exception
when first item of playList play then pause then resume then previous ,previous must return PreviousNotExist Exception
when stop and no track play yet, stop must return PlayingTrackNotExist Exception
when playTrack then play that track again, it must return TrackAlreadyPlaying exception
when pause and no track play yet, pause must return PlayingTrackNotExist Exception
when playList isEmpty then addToQueue then playTrack, must return newTrack(addToQueueItem)
when first track of playList play, getNextPlayList must return playList size minus 1
when play first track then stop then play again, getPlayingTrack must returned correct track id
when addToQueue first then playNext, must return newTrack(addToQueueItem)
when playTrack, result must have Playing status
when first item of playList play then playNext, second track must return
when 5 time playNext then playNext again, last PlayNext must return EndOfPlayList Exception
when stop, getPlayingTrack must return PlayingTrackNotExist Exception
when all tracks of playList seen, playNext must return EndOfPlayList Exception
when first track of playList play then stop, getNextPlayList must return playList size minus 1
when play then pause then stop, getPlayingTrack must return PlayingTrackNotExist Exception
when first item of playList play then twice PlayNext, third track must return
when playList not loaded yet or Empty,playNext must return PlayListIsEmpty Exception
when first item of playList play, previous must return PreviousNotExist Exception
when play first track then playNext then previous , getPlayingTrack must return first track of playList
when playNext 2 times then previous 1 times then pause then resume , getPlayingTrack must return the second track of playList
when playList not loaded yet or empty list , previous must return PreviousNotExist Exception
when playNext until last track visit in playlist then addToQueue then playNext, getPlayingTrack must return newTrack(addToQueueItem)
when play first Track , getPlayingTrack must return that track
when first item of playList play then pause then previous ,previous must return PreviousNotExist Exception
when playTrack , getPlayingTrack must have Playing status
when playlist is empty or not loaded yet, playTrack must return PlayListIsEmpty exception
when all tracks played, getNextPlayList must return endOfPlayList Exception
when resume a paused track, it must return track
when addToQueue first then playTrack, must return first track not new track that added
when resume and one track already playing, resume must return PausedTrackNotFound Exception
when first item of playList play then stop then previous , previous must return PreviousNotExist Exception
when pause and pause time exceed track duration, pause must return PauseTimeError Exception
when playList load then playNext then previous , must return first track of playList
when resume a paused track, the resume time returned must correct value
when play first track then playNext then addToQueue then playNext, must return newTrack(addToQueueItem)
when play first track then playNext then previous ,previous must return first track of playList
when addToQueue first then play Track then playNext, must return newTrack(addToQueueItem)
when playNext 2 times then previous 1 times then pause then play , getPlayingTrack must return the second track of playList
when playTrack, it must return that track
when playlist already loaded and not Empty and not any track play yet, nextPlayList(queue) size must equal all playlist Tracks
when first track of playList play then pause, getNextPlayList must return playList size minus 1
when resume and no track play yet, resume must return PausedTrackNotFound Exception
when pause, getPlayingTrack must return PlayingTrackNotExist Exception
when playNext 5 times then previous 1 times , must return the fifth track of playList
when resume a paused track, the resume track must have playing state
when playNext 3 times then previous 2 times , must return the second track of playList
when playList Load and not any track played yet, playNext must return second track
when playing track exist, pause must result be Success
when loaded PlayList is Empty, getNextPlayList must return PlayListIsEmpty Exception
when resume a paused track, the getPlayingTrack must return track
